title: United Kingdom
description: In July 2010 my family took a trip to the UK where we drove from London up into Scotland and then back down.

photos.description: Underneath Tower Bridge. Apparently not falling down.
photos.alt: Looking up at the underside of the pedestrian walkways on Tower Bridge.

photos.description: A very hairy cow. I'd like a better picture, but the only time we saw them closer it was very dark.
photos.alt: A hairy cow grazing in a field.
A lake surrounded by mild grassy hills.
A colorful rooster in the grass.

photos.description: Hadrian's wall in a field of sheep (not pictured). Pretty good framing I think.
photos.alt: A knee-high stone wall leading directly away from the camera over a small grassy hill.
